io.github.josephtaylor.marshal

Class Marshal

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.josephtaylor.marshal.Marshal

  • public class Marshal
extends Object
    Main class of the MarshalP5 library. Allows for saving / loading objects to various data formats and transforming them among formats.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Marshal(processing.core.PApplet parent)

      • load

        public Object load(File file)
        Loads the file to an object. Format is determined by the extension on the file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be loaded.
        Returns:
        the object(s) contained in the file.

      • load

        public Object load(File file,
                   DataFormat dataFormat)
        Loads the file to an object.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be loaded.
        dataFormat - the file format of the file.
        Returns:
        the object(s) contained in the file.

      • load

        public Object load(String filename,
                   DataFormat dataFormat)
        Loads the file to an object.
        Parameters:
        filename - the full path of the file or the relative path of the file to the data folder
        dataFormat - the file format of the file.
        Returns:
        the object(s) contained in the file.

      • load

        public <T> T load(String filename,
                  Class<T> type)
        Loads the file to an object of type T. File format is determined by the extension of the file name.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the object to be loaded.
        Parameters:
        filename - the full path of the file or the relative path of the file to the data folder.
        type - the type of the object to be loaded.
        Returns:
        the object(s) contained in the file.

      • load

                  Class<T> type,
                  DataFormat dataFormat)
        Loads the file to an object of type T.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the object to be loaded.
        Parameters:

        type - the type of the object to be loaded.
        dataFormat - the file format of the file.

        the object(s) contained in the file.

      • save

        public void save(Object obj,
                 File file)
        Save the given object to the given file. Format is determined by the extension of the file name.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to be saved.
        file - the file to which the object will be saved.

      • save

        public void save(Object obj,
                 File file,
                 DataFormat dataFormat)
        Saves the object to the file using the specified format.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to be saved.
        file - the file where the object is to be saved.
        dataFormat - the file format.

      • save

        public void save(Object obj,
                 String filename,
                 DataFormat dataFormat)
        Saves the object to the file using the specified format.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to be saved.
        filename - the full filepath or the relative path to the data folder.
        dataFormat - the file format.

        public Object unmarshal(String marshaledObject,
                        DataFormat dataFormat)
        Converts the given String to an object.
        Parameters:
        marshaledObject - the marshaled String representation of the object
        dataFormat - the file format of the marshaled String object.
        Returns:
        the unmarshaled object.

      • unmarshal

        public <T> T unmarshal(String marshaledObject,
                       Class<T> type,
                       DataFormat dataFormat)
        Converts the given String to an object of type T.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the marshaled object
        Parameters:
        marshaledObject - the marshaled String representation of the object
        type - the type of the marshaled object to be returned.
        dataFormat - the data format of the marshaled object.
        Returns:
        the unmarshaled object.
